name: WKAudioFilePlayerItem
desc: An object that manages the presentation state of an audio file while it is playing.  DeprecatedUse the AVFoundation framework’s AVPlayer and AVQueuePlayer classes instead.

items.name: init(asset: WKAudioFileAsset)
items.desc: Creates and returns a player item for the specified audio file asset.

items.name: var asset: WKAudioFileAsset
items.desc: The audio file asset being managed.

items.name: var status: WKAudioFilePlayerItemStatus
items.desc: The status of the player item.

items.name: var error: Error?
items.desc: An error that describes the cause of a failure.

items.name: var currentTime: TimeInterval
items.desc: The current playback point, measured in seconds, from the beginning of the audio file.

items.name: func setCurrentTime(TimeInterval)
items.desc: Sets the playback point, measured in seconds, from the beginning of the audio file.

items.name: enum WKAudioFilePlayerItemStatus
items.desc: Constants that represent the status of a player item.

items.name: static let WKAudioFilePlayerItemTimeJumped: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: A notification that the item’s current time has changed discontinuously.

items.name: static let WKAudioFilePlayerItemDidPlayToEndTime: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: A notification that the item has played successfully to its end.

items.name: static let WKAudioFilePlayerItemFailedToPlayToEndTime: NSNotification.Name
items.desc: A notification that the item failed to play to its end.
